text: Hōfu () is a city in Yamaguchi Prefecture, Japan. == History == Hōfu (防府) means "the capital (国府) of Suō Province (周防国)". The eastern part of Yamaguchi Prefecture used to be called called Suō Province. The city was founded on August 25, 1936. The city's change over the past fifty years is shown in the animated movie Mai Mai Miracle, and the story takes place in the year 1955 (with flashbacks that go 1,000 years further back).Stills from the film juxtaposed with modern photos == References == Category:Cities in Yamaguchi Prefecture
title: Hōfu
